careers.Software Engineer: Involves coding, data analysis, AI, and problem-solving in technology.
careers.Mechanical Engineer: Focuses on designing and improving machines, robotics, and mechanical systems.
careers.Doctor/Nurse: Medical professionals who diagnose, treat, and care for patients.
careers.Business Executive: Leads companies, manages teams, and develops business strategies.
careers.Artist/Content Creator: Creates visual, written, or digital media to entertain or inform audiences.
